definition: to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
lay hands on/to cover
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to ask

sentences.english: I remembered my songs in the night.
sentences.chinese: 我想起我夜間的歌曲，捫心自問。

sentences.english: Continue to ask yourself hard questions about the nature of work.
sentences.chinese: 請繼續捫心自問，關於工作的本質意義問題。

sentences.english: Ask if the criticism is helpful.
sentences.chinese: 捫心自問，這批評是對的嗎？

sentences.english: The wrinkled postcard now made me reconsider .
sentences.chinese: 此刻這張打皺的明信片卻促我重新捫心自問。

sentences.english: Banging your heart against some mad bugger's wall.
sentences.chinese: 面對那些瘋子的牆時，請捫心自問。

sentences.english: Just ask ourselves whether we really deserve the pay we receive.
sentences.chinese: 捫心自問，我們對得起這份收入嗎？

sentences.english: Sir, ask yourself, what will Jesus do?
sentences.chinese: 老師，請捫心自問，耶穌會怎麼做？

sentences.english: "But we may now ask ourselves, how long can this party last?
sentences.chinese: 但是，現在我們必須捫心自問，這個派對能繼續多久？

sentences.english: Continue to ask yourself hard questions about the nature of work.
sentences.chinese: 請繼續捫心自問，關於工作的本質意義問題。

sentences.english: Ask yourself are you not moths as well?
sentences.chinese: 捫心自問難道你們不一樣是投火的飛蛾麼？

sentences.english: This is what we should always ask ourselves topic.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們應該經常捫心自問的話題。

sentences.english: The questions you have to ask yourself don't end there.
sentences.chinese: 你需要捫心自問的問題還不止這些？

definition: to prevail upon/to coax
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to shiver
to force someone to do something
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
conclusion/judgment/verdict
to worry about
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to write off at one stroke
(Buddhism) retribution/karma
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
